description:
There are two versions of the Goliath:
- The Goliath encountered in episode 11 is a lvl 4 monster and the 17th level boss that respawns every two weeks. This version has low agility and high strenght.
- And The Black Goliath apears in episodes 12 and 13. It is an irregular monster that spawned once in response to the presence of gods in the dungeon. The black goliath is level 5, he has high strength and agility and unlike the white goliath has the following abilities: High Regeneration, and a range magic attack.
name: Black Goliath
